name: enigmatically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is mysterious and impossible to understand completely: "Who was that?" "Just a man I know," she said enigmatically. enigmatically beautiful artworks See
enigmatic
More examplesFewer examplesHe walked along the train platform, enigmatically observing people. The film concerns a man who enigmatically vanishes on a beach, and his wife's efforts to find out what happened.He smiled enigmatically.
